long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This addon fixes various annoyances on the ItsLearning site. If your school uses ItsLearning, this addon is a must have. Below is a list of features that the addon currently provides:

- The user of the "Enter" key under class search
- Disables autologout

The addon is still being expanded and new features are being added over time. If you have any ideas or feedback, feel free to contact me at jaxziiii174@gmail.com.
